Summary: Large, bright planet-like "star", red-white-gold colored, glowing; 4 other, dimmer lights briefly appeared at its left
trends: There have been no other sightings in Camden
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was home at 9:30 pm, talking on the phone, when my daughter called me into her loft bedroom to show me (through her skylight) a bright light in the sky, which at first glance appeared to be a very bright star or planet. it glowed\shone red-gold-white and would dim and become bright again. it would also blink in and out randomly. after about 15 - 30 seconds, several dimmer points of light suddenly appeared (and then quickly disappeared) directly to the left of the bright object, lighting up as if at corners of a square. then the lights, including the original larger, brighter one, disappeared. entire sighting lasted no more than 3 - 5 minutes. tonight is cold, very clear, lots of stars.
